doc.description: Create, delete or extend the capacity of a volume on Pure Storage FlashArray.
doc.notes:
This module requires the C(purestorage) and C(py-pure-client) Python libraries
Additional Python librarues may be required for specific modules.
You must set C(PUREFA_URL) and C(PUREFA_API) environment variables if I(fa_url) and I(api_token) arguments are not passed to the module directly

api_token.description: FlashArray API token for admin privileged user.

bw_qos.description: Bandwidth limit for volume in M or G units. M will set MB/s G will set GB/s To clear an existing QoS setting use 0 (zero)

count.description:
Number of volumes to be created in a multiple volume creation
Only supported from Purity//FA v6.0.0 and higher

digits.description:
Number of digits to use for multiple volume count. This will pad the index number with zeros where necessary
Only supported from Purity//FA v6.0.0 and higher
Range is between 1 and 10

eradicate.description: Define whether to eradicate the volume on delete or leave in trash.

fa_url.description: FlashArray management IPv4 address or Hostname.

iops_qos.description: IOPs limit for volume - use value or K or M K will mean 1000 M will mean 1000000 To clear an existing IOPs setting use 0 (zero)

move.description:
Move a volume in and out of a pod or vgroup
Provide the name of pod or vgroup to move the volume to
Pod and Vgroup names must be unique in the array
To move to the local array, specify C(local)
This is not idempotent - use C(ignore_errors) in the play

name.description:
The name of the volume.
Volume could be created in a POD with this syntax POD_NAME::VOLUME_NAME.
Volume could be created in a volume group with this syntax VG_NAME/VOLUME_NAME.
Multi-volume support available from Purity//FA 6.0.0 B(***NOTE***) Manual deletion or eradication of individual volumes created using multi-volume will cause idempotency to fail
Multi-volume support only exists for volume creation

overwrite.description: Define whether to overwrite a target volume if it already exisits.

pgroup.description:
Name of exisitng, not deleted, protection group to add volume to
Only application for volume(s) creation

rename.description:
Value to rename the specified volume to.
Rename only applies to the container the current volumes is in.
There is no requirement to specify the pod or vgroup name as this is implied.

size.description: Volume size in M, G, T or P units.

start.description:
Number at which to start the multiple volume creation index
Only supported from Purity//FA v6.0.0 and higher

state.description: Define whether the volume should exist or not.

suffix.description:
Suffix string, if required, for multiple volume create
Volume names will be formed as I(<name>#I<suffix>), where I(#) is a placeholder for the volume index See associated descriptions
Only supported from Purity//FA v6.0.0 and higher

target.description: The name of the target volume, if copying.

doc.short_description: Manage volumes on Pure Storage FlashArrays

purestorage.flasharray.purefa_volume.examples:
- name: Create new volume named foo with a QoS limit
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    size: 1T
    bw_qos: 58M
    iops_qos: 23K
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Create new volume named foo in pod bar in protection group pg1
  purefa_volume:
    name: bar::foo
    prgoup: pg1
    size: 1T
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Create 10 volumes with index starting at 10 but padded with 3 digits
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    size: 1T
    suffix: bar
    count: 10
    start: 10
    digits: 3
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Extend the size of an existing volume named foo
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    size: 2T
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Delete and eradicate volume named foo
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    eradicate: yes
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: absent

- name: Create clone of volume bar named foo
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    target: bar
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Overwrite volume bar with volume foo
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    target: bar
    overwrite: yes
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Clear volume QoS from volume foo
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    bw_qos: 0
    iops_qos: 0
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present

- name: Move local volume foo from local array to pod bar
  purefa_volume:
    name: foo
    move: bar
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Move volume foo in pod bar to local array
  purefa_volume:
    name: bar::foo
    move: local
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Move volume foo in pod bar to vgroup fin
  purefa_volume:
    name: bar::foo
    move: fin
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

doc.description:
Manage volume tags for volumes on Pure Storage FlashArray.
Requires a minimum of Purity 6.0.0
doc.notes:
This module requires the C(purestorage) and C(py-pure-client) Python libraries
Additional Python librarues may be required for specific modules.
You must set C(PUREFA_URL) and C(PUREFA_API) environment variables if I(fa_url) and I(api_token) arguments are not passed to the module directly

api_token.description: FlashArray API token for admin privileged user.

copyable.description: Define whether the volume tags are inherited on volume copies.

fa_url.description: FlashArray management IPv4 address or Hostname.

kvp.description:
List of key value pairs to assign to the volume.
Seperate the key from the value using a colon (:) only.
All items in list will use I(namespace) and I(copyable) settings.
Maximum of 5 tags per volume
See examples for exact formatting requirements

name.description: The name of the volume.

state.description: Define whether the volume tag(s) should exist or not.

doc.short_description: Manage volume tags on Pure Storage FlashArrays

purestorage.flasharray.purefa_volume_tag.examples:
- name: Create new tags in namespace test for volume foo
  purefa_volume_tags:
    name: foo
    namespace: test
    copyable: false
    kvp:
    - 'key1:value1'
    - 'key2:value2'
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Remove an existing tag in namespace test for volume foo
  purefa_volume_tags:
    name: foo
    namespace: test
    kvp:
    - 'key1:value1'
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: absent

- name: Update an existing tag in namespace test for volume foo
  purefa_volume_tags:
    name: foo
    namespace: test
    kvp:
    - 'key1:value2'
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
    state: present
